comment: Pre-review complete. CR-010 meets all pre-review criteria per SOP-002: (1) Purpose is clear - establish SOP-005 for code governance. (2) Scope is well-defined - single new SOP document. (3) Rationale identifies specific gaps in current QMS coverage for code governance. (4) Execution plan is complete with 5 sequential execution items. (5) Proposed SOP-005 content is comprehensive, covering separation of concerns, development models (Execution Branch and Genesis Sandbox), traceability, and version control. Recommend proceeding to pre-approval.

Post-review complete. All requirements per SOP-002 Section 7.3 verified: (1) All 5 execution items show status COMPLETE. (2) SOP-005 created under this CR is EFFECTIVE at v1.0. (3) Completion evidence is recorded for each execution item. Testing summary requirements verified: SOP-005 created, all 11 sections present, diagrams clear, procedures actionable. Recommend post-approval.
